name: Hostage: Rescue Mission
description: Special Alert: Terrorists have invaded our embassy and seized an undetermined number of hostages...Lives hang in the balance as high ranking diplomats are held at gunpoint...Their safety requires immediate action... prepare to infiltrate the embassy, neutralize the terrorists, and rescue the hostages, or die trying.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Pemtium 4 Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Athlon 64 or later Storage: 256 MB available space
